text: Mugihe bugurura amatu yabo basanze amatungo yabo yasubijwe iwabo, baca bavuga bati:- mbega Data wacu ikindi dushaka n’igiki ?Aya matungo yacu yasubijwe iwacu, tukaba twazanye ibifungurwa kubera abantu bacu, natwe tuzomukingira mwene wacu kandi tuzoronka igipimo c’Ingamiya imwe irenzeko ico naco nico gipimo kibayabaye
